name: Oxygenize
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You project intense amounts of oxygen in a line 60 feet long, 15 feet wide, and 15 feet tall. Creatures in the area must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or choke and wheeze from inhaling too much oxygen, losing 3 AP on their next turn. On a success, they lose 1 AP instead.

The excess oxygen rapidly rusts all metal equipment in the area. Rusted weapons do 1 damage instead of rolling their damage die, and rusted armor has its AC set to 10 and its damage reduction to -2. Magical weapons and armor remove this rust at the end of your next turn.

The excess oxygen disperses at the end of your next turn. If anything takes fire damage in the area, the entire area explodes, dealing 4d6 fire damage to all creatures in the area and immediately removing the excess oxygen.
